text: Tina Louise (b. Tina Black, February 11, 1934) is an American sitcom and movie actress. She is best known for playing Ginger Grant on the television series Gilligan's Island. She also played a doomed housewife in the 1975 movie The Stepford Wives, which was well received. She was born in New York City. ==References== Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from New York City Category:1934 births Category:Living people
title: Tina Louise
